nodes.text: Greff-Timms Industrial was an arms manufacturing company that produced the ATA pulse-wave blaster, a disruptor pistol that was considered state-of-the-art millennia before the Galactic Civil War.

Greff-Timms Industrial was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Gadgets and Gear, a 2019 role-playing supplement released by Fantasy Flight Games. The company originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it first appeared in Tales of the Jedi Companion, a 1996 supplement to Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game written by George R. Strayton.
